sections.title: Team PANIC
sections.text: Our team name, PANIC, stands for Pathfinding Automobile Network of Induction Charging

sections.title: Cars
sections.text: The car is built in a custom designed 3d printed shell, with a wireless charging coil, two motors and a lot of electronics

sections.title: Road
sections.text: The road can be created anywhere, with just a few strips of colored tape and some printed Aruco tags

sections.title: Hosting
sections.text: This website is currently hosted on Cloudflare Pages, it is using a custom domain from nic.eu.org.

sections.title: Framework
sections.text: This website is built using React and vanilla css with a tiny bit of tailwindcss. It also uses the MUI library, a Material UI library that provides prebuilt React components such as buttons, which are used all over the site, and content display components like stacks and grids.
